data.name: Capstone Project
data.description: The development of the E-School Digitalization System: Online Register Notebook (ORB) focuses on managing online register notebooks, accounts, timetables, attendances,notifications, marks, class, and subjects. It further facilitates quick and convenient tracking of statistics. ORB is increasingly prospects in the current context with the Prime Minister's approval of Decision No. 749/QĐ-TTg, endorsing the 'Chương trình Chuyển đổi số quốc gia đến năm 2025, định hướng đến năm 2030'. This decree not only reinforces the state's commitment to the adoption and development of digital technology but also establishes a significant policy foundation for educational institutions to undertake digitization, aligning with global technological advancements.
